state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First thing I need you to do is to try to take a trip west. And then, make an effort to move south. Next, head south. And then, attempt to venture east. Then, make an attempt to travel south. And then, try to take a trip east. After that, head north. With that accomplished, try to go east. After that, try to head north. Then, venture north. After that, make an attempt to go west. After that, travel north. After that, go west. And then, lift the durian from the floor of the bedchamber. That's it! -= Closet =- You've just shown up in a closet. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You can make out a shelf. The shelf is standard. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it? You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Closet =-0/1
next_state: -= Shower =- You are in a shower. A standard one. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. > -= Shower =-0/2
